subject: Pedal shipping
description_text:
Hello,
I am thinking of making an order of some pedals, to Ireland in the EU. Where are they shipped from? Will I be liable to pay customs/import duties/VAT?

Kind regards,
Alan

conversations.body_text: Hi alan coffey,    Our German warehouse is currently out of stock. We will ship from China via UPS, and customs clearance may be required. However, if any duties apply, we will cover a portion of them for youâ€”no need to worry.

Could you let me know when plus x pedals are in stock in Germany, and also when the hs pro shifter is in stock on Germany.
Thanks
Alan

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

[cid:8a0f8a61-d6db-4fa0-991e-38a5644cd59a]
Hello again,
Could you tell me the difference between the newest simsonn plus x and the ones on the left here?
Thanks,
Alan
